_comments.ai.authentication: Uses Claude CLI (logged-in account) first, falls back to ANTHROPIC_API_KEY if CLI unavailable
_comments.ai.fallbackOnly: If true, only use AI when pattern matching fails. If false, always analyze for better extraction.
_comments.ai.maxBudgetUsd: Maximum spend per analysis call (Claude CLI only)
_comments.vault.enabled: Sync captured items to Obsidian vault (requires obsidian-vault plugin)
